original_text: Who does God accept as right with himself? It is those people who obey his Law. It is not the people who only know his Law but do not obey them.
korean_text: 하나님 앞에서는 율법을 듣는 자가 의인이 아니요 오직 율법을 행하는 자라야 의롭다 하심을 얻으리니

sentences.original_text: Who does God accept as right with himself?
It is those people who obey his Law.
It is not the people who only know his Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그의 율법을 아는 사람들이 아니라
